meanings.definition: A person who adds notes or comments to a text or document.
meanings.sent1: The annotators in the library help students understand the books better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the annotators to mark important points in the article.
meanings.sent3: The annotators at the meeting were so enthusiastic that they filled the margins with jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her pen danced across the paper like an annotator eager to share insights.
meanings.sent5: The annotators' colorful notes turned the dull document into a vibrant discussion.

meanings.definition: Software or tools used to add notes or comments to a text or document.
meanings.sent1: The new annotators on the app make it easier to highlight key information.
meanings.sent2: I downloaded the annotators to help me organize my research findings.
meanings.sent3: The annotators on the computer worked so fast, it was like magic.
meanings.sent4: The annotators functioned like digital assistants, enhancing the user's experience.
meanings.sent5: With the annotators, editing documents became a breeze.
